text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo Because Cuomo cares he brought COVID levels down...because DeSantis doesn’t care Florida will now need those body bags you’re talking about. This tweet is vulgar to those who have passed away due to COVID19 and Trump’s ignorance. You’re about as bad as #YouKnowWhoYoHo.
